name: Eyesore
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
One creature that you can see within range per AP spent must make a Constitution saving throw or have their eyes attacked, harshly reducing their vision. They become only able to see creatures within 10 feet, and are considered blinded to anything outside of that range.

At the end of each of their turns, a creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the spell ends for that creature. On a failure, their range of vision is increased by 10 feet.
empower: The target is blinded instead and fails their first repeated saving throw against this spell automatically.
